name: XCSourceTextBuffer
desc: A buffer you use to access and modify the text contents and text selections in a source editor.

items.name: var contentUTI: String
items.desc: The Unique Type Identifier (UTI) of the content in the buffer.

items.name: var lines: NSMutableArray
items.desc: The lines of text in the buffer, including line endings.

items.name: var selections: NSMutableArray
items.desc: The text selections in the buffer.

items.name: var indentationWidth: Int
items.desc: The number of space characters used for indentation of the text in the buffer.

items.name: var usesTabsForIndentation: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether tabs are used for indentation.

items.name: var tabWidth: Int
items.desc: The number of space characters represented by a tab character in the buffer.
